description: Newly emerged with visible yolk sac
Recently emerged with yolk sac absorbed (button-up fry), Seam along mid-ventral line visible, Pigmentation undeveloped
Seam along mid-ventral line not visible, Scales firmly set, Darkly pigmented with distinct parr marks, No silvery coloration
Parr marks visible but faded; intermediate degree of silvering
Parr marks highly faded or absent, Bright silver or nearly white coloration, Scales easily shed (deciduous), Black trailing edge on caudal fin, Body/head elongating
